Campus Safety
Greek Life
Clubs and Activities

Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun

Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
The officers at the Public Safety office are always willing to walk students to their car, help start their cars, and they also keep the lost and found at there office.
No greek life on campus.

Located inside of the Campus Center, Student Life supports a large range of clubs and organizations. There are clubs that range from Multicultural Club, Anthropology Club, GLBT Club, to Hmong Cub, and Student Nurses Association to just name a few.
If you're a student that loves diversity, affordable tuition, and a warm welcome then North Hennepin Community College is the college for you.
The campus center is where everyone on comes to just relax, grab a meal, meet with visiting universities, study, and sign up and make clubs/organizations.
North Hennepin Community College is affordable. The college offers a large amount of FREE events for students. All you've got to do is come and have a good time.

There is ALWAYS something going on campus. Whether it be a debate or having all your instructors dance at the Campus Center. There are tons of things to do. The recreation center always has a fun tournament for students and staff to join.
There are several different options to choose from. There are also multiple different spots for a quick grab for something to eat right before you head to class.
There are no dorms, but there are always postings around the school of available, affordable apartments for rent/rooms for rent.
The instructors make sure their students really understand what is being taught.
Join clubs! I entered the school without any friends. It helped a lot to join a club through Student Life because now I feel much more comfortable and confident as a student.

North Hennepin Community College is a college with a atmosphere that draws you in. Everyone, from students to staff are ALWAYS WILLING to help each other out. Everyone in college is going after a specific goal, at NHCC, we make sure we get everyone to reach their goals together.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students This school is a great opportunity for those who like small school, small population, and close to home. Tips for prospective students Go to class everyday and take notes. You don't want to miss a class lecture because you will fall behind class and its going to be hard to catch up. Bang for the buck Its a good amount to start off college for a 2 yr. Am enjoying being here I enjoy being here; there is lots of great professors and friends. Am learning a lot I learn something new everyday and I just keep striving to learn more.
